# Quickstart

## Installation

```bash
git clone https://github.com/jbirky/alabi
cd alabi
python setup.py install
```

## Dependencies

```{note} 
See https://github.com/jbirky/alabi/network/dependencies
````

## Basic Example

```{note} 
Add 1D function example
````

```python
from alabi.core import SurrogateModel
```
